name: Wisp Catacombs (Alpha)
description:
**This is an alpha of my current roguelike project**

For now there is no proper tutorial, but you can still see the inputs required to play in-game

Currently, there are 3 worlds with around 10 enemies per world, including a boss, there is also a final boss after the 3rd boss

I will post new versions about every months for patches and new content

Good game, I would love to receive comments on this little project to try improving it
